title: Chevy Chase Was in an 8-Day Coma After Heart Failure in 2021; Daughter Recalls Doctors Saying “We Might Not Get Him Back”
summary: "[He] has basically come back from the dead," Caley Chase said in the upcoming documentary, 'I'm Chevy Chase and You’re Not,' premiering New Year's Day on CNN. The 'SNL' alum also now has problems with his memory.
